comments.body: instead of using `fs.Stat` it actually only uses `isDirectory()` and ignores everything else. This typing allows using a subset of `fs.Stat` to pre-fill the cache
Do these improvements apply to 5.0 or just 7.1?

I honestly don't know. I only checked the implementation of the current major release.
I wouldn't want to change it for the existing typings version as it might someone's build.

for non-existent files `false` is stored in the cache, for any other error `undefined` is stored

https://github.com/isaacs/node-glob/blob/8882c8fccabbe459465e73cc2581e121a5fdd25b/sync.js#L443-L466

if `lstat(Sync)` fails with an error other than ENOENT, it stores `undefined` in the symlink cache

https://github.com/isaacs/node-glob/blob/8882c8fccabbe459465e73cc2581e121a5fdd25b/sync.js#L259-L260
